questions.question: Select the POSITIVE impact of tourism

choices.answer: Tourist activities may lead to improper waste disposal and littering
Air pollution from tourist transportation that leads to high CO2 emissions
Local economy is boosted by tourists visiting the area
Tourism can lead to culture clashes between tourists and locals

questions.question: Select the NEGATIVE impact of tourism

choices.answer: Tourism can lead to raised awareness about the local environment
Tourism can be a catalyst for strengthening local communities
Many jobs can be created due to tourism
Tourism development can put pressure on natural resources

The Pyramids of Giza

questions.question: How old are the Pyramids of Giza?

questions.question: The Great Wall of China is one of the seven wonders of the world:

choices.answer: Tourists take bits off the Great Wall for souvenirs
Parts of the Great Wall have been defaced by graffiti
